channel.title: Blogs on Precision Analytics
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on Precision Analytics

item.title: The most helpful (and shaming) productivity tool ever
item.description: During my studies, I struggled to evaluate my productivity. The research years of my PhD were long and lacked structure. It felt as though I spent every day sitting in front of my computer slowly chipping away at the amorphous blob that was my thesis. I discovered Rescue Time and it totally changed my life! It’s an app that you can run on your desktop that tracks which ever active window your working on.

item.title: The 'having an office' effect on cafe expenses
item.description: Precision Analytics found a permament home in July 2017 at Nexus Coworking space. Before then, we were working out of our own homes or at coffee shops. I track my personal spending, and I noticed a pretty strong ‘office effect’ on having a permanent space to work - and make my own coffee! The y-axis is proportionate to the dollars I spent at cafes per month. Of course, the spending will probably never go to zero…the lattes at le Darling are too good.

item.title: Our website is live!
item.description: We built our website using Hugo and GitHub pages.
